tool_description: Controls the actual radiographic image capture process, integrating positioning data and exposure parameters to acquire the digital image.
error_messages: Exposure parameter out of range: kVp must be between 40-150, mAs must be between 0.1-1000.
Patient ID required: Valid patient identifier must be provided.
Equipment not ready: X-ray equipment is not prepared for exposure.
Safety interlock active: Radiation safety systems preventing exposure.
Image receptor error: Digital detector not responding or positioned incorrectly.
usage: Set exposure_kvp, exposure_mas, patient_id, and study_description. Ensure all safety protocols are followed before initiating capture.

image_file_path.description: File path to the captured DICOM image

capture_timestamp.description: Timestamp of image capture in ISO format

image_size.description: Image dimensions and file size information
